entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets beginning overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to rain showers at times heavy in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the morning and afternoon. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
